sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"苦恼，痛苦"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: agony, anguish, torment, torture, grief, misery, distress, sorrow
means: agony ：侧重指精神或身体痛苦的剧烈程度。
anguish ：指精神方面令人难以忍受的极度痛苦；用于身体时，多指局部或暂时的痛苦。
torment ：强调烦恼或痛苦的长期性。
torture ：语气比toment强，指在精神或肉体上受到的折磨所产生的痛苦。
grief ：指由某种特殊处境或原因造成的强烈的感情上的苦恼与悲痛。
misery ：着重痛苦的可悲状态，多含不幸、可怜或悲哀的意味。
distress ：多指因思想上的压力紧张、恐惧、忧虑等所引起的精神上的痛苦，也可指某种灾难带来的痛苦。
sorrow ：语气比grief弱，指因不幸、损失或失望等所产生的悲伤。

word_mean: 悲伤：对外部的和意识到的损失的正常情绪反应。具自制性，经一定时间逐渐消失。另见mourning

sentence.Network_en: "He's been arrested for theft and burglary." — "Good grief!"
sentence.Network_cn: “他因为偷窃和入室盗窃而被逮捕了。”——“我的天哪！”

sentence.Network_en: There was no grief in his expression, only deep resignation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的表情里没有悲痛，只有深深的无奈。

sentence.Network_en: We all felt as if we were intruding on his private grief.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都觉得似乎触及到了他内心的伤痛。

恫字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 恐惧〖 fear〗 悲痛;伤心〖 grief;sorrow〗 呻吟〖 groan〗.
《Friends》词汇表B ... documentary n. 记录片 grief n. 悲痛, 伤心事, 不幸, 忧伤 deserves vt. 应受, 值得v.应受.

被剥夺的悲伤（disenfranchised grief）—家中有罹患忧郁症、精神分裂…等精神疾病的家属，尤其是父母亲，必须长期面对挫折与痛 …
pathological gambling 病态嗜赌pathological grief 病理性悲伤pathological inertia 病理惰性
Grief什么意思 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... genuine imitation 真实摹拟 good grief 哎呀 (好的悲伤) gourmet pizza 顶级披萨.
TBBT笔记 S1E07 ... Regale with/on 盛情款待；享用 Good grief 天哪 Sore loser 输不起的人.

jx.jx_en_mean: have an accident; meet with disaster

lj.lj_ly: many a ship has come to grief along this shore.
lj.lj_ls: 很多船只都在这一带沿海遇难。

jx.jx_en_mean: an exclamation of surprise or alarm
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用以表示惊奇或恐慌］哎呀，天哪

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French grief, from grever 'to burden' (see grieve)

entry.def: Grief is a feeling of extreme sadness.

example.ex: ...a huge outpouring of national grief for the victims of the shootings...
example.tran: 举国上下对枪击事件中的遇害者所表现出的万分悲痛之情

example.ex: Their grief soon gave way to anger.
example.tran: 他们的悲痛迅速转化为愤怒。

entry.def: If something comes to grief, it fails. If someone comes to grief, they fail in something they are doing, and may be hurt.

example.ex: So many marriages have come to grief over lack of money...
example.tran: 许多婚姻都因缺钱而以失败告终。

example.ex: He was driving a Mercedes racer at 100 mph and almost came to grief.
example.tran: 他当时驾驶着一辆梅塞德斯赛车以每小时100英里时速度飞驰，险些出事。

entry.def: Some people say 'Good grief' when they are surprised or shocked.

example.ex: 'He's been arrested for theft and burglary.' — 'Good grief!'
example.tran: “他因为偷窃和入室盗窃而被逮捕了。”——“我的天哪！”

means.word_mean: 1. intense sorrow caused by loss of a loved one (especially by death)

sentences.sentence: "her death was a great grief to John"

auth_sentence.content: This is not normal when expressing grief and sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not normal when expressing grief and sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not normal when expressing grief and sadness.

auth_sentence.content: Nowadays, that distinction brings more grief than glory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nowadays, that distinction brings more grief than glory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nowadays, that distinction brings more grief than glory.

stems_affixes.word_buile: grieve悲伤+ance表名词→说悲伤的话→牢骚

stems_affixes.word_buile: ag加强,增加+grieve[v.使悲伤,使伤心]→加重烦恼

sentences.en: Love, hate, joy, fear and grief are emotions.
sentences.cn: 爱、恨、高兴、恐惧、悲伤都是情感。

means.word_mean: 悲伤的事, 悲痛的缘由

sentences.en: Her death was a real grief.
sentences.cn: 她的去世实在令人痛心。
